heading: Today
text: Mostly cloudy, some clearing developing in the southeast becoming cloudy later in the day. Good chance of showers north Route 4, more scattered to the south. Highs in the low to mid 50s, upper 50s in the valleys in the far south. South to southwest wind 10 to 15 mph.

heading: Tonight
text: Mostly cloudy north, occasional clearing south. Chance of rain showers, mixing with snow in the mountains. Lows from the mid 30s to near 40, mid 40s along Lake Champlain. Wind becoming light and variable.

heading: Friday
text: Mostly cloudy, variable clouds south in the morning. Periods of scattered showers throughout the day. High temperatures from the mid 40s to near 50 north, and low to mid 50s in the south. West wind at 5 mph.
